titleStmt.title: At the court at Whitehall the second of November, 1678 by the Kings Most Excellent Majesty and the Lords of His Majesties most honourable Privy Council : His Majesty was this day pleased to declare in Council, that whosoever shall make discovery of any officer or souldier of His Majesties horse or foot-guards, who having formerly taken the oaths of allegiance ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
